rows.label: bf07270100_0020
rows.name:
I guess you and I are more
alike than you thought, chum.

rows.label: bf07270100_0030
rows.name:
Though mine was just a
surgical procedure.

rows.label: bf07270100_0040
rows.name:
You make it sound so simple. I'm still
trying to wrap my head around it.

rows.label: bf07270100_0050
rows.name:
You know the people of Acedia can
trace their roots back to Judicium?

rows.label: bf07270100_0065
rows.name:
The creators of that Divine Beast
weapon thing from Temperantia?

rows.label: bf07270100_0070
rows.name:
That's right. They fused humans and
Blades at the cellular level...

rows.label: bf07270100_0080
rows.name:
The Man-Eater technology apparently
originated from Judicium as well.

rows.label: bf07270100_0090
rows.name:
So that's how... the
surgery was possible?

rows.label: bf07270100_0100
rows.name:
Yeah! Using the regenerative
abilities of Blades like Saika,

rows.label: bf07270100_0110
rows.name: they repaired my damaged body, ya see?

rows.label: bf07270100_0120
rows.name: Since I received part of Saika's core,

rows.label: bf07270100_0130
rows.name:
I'm not a Man-Eater but more
like a... Blade-Eater!

rows.label: bf07270100_0160
rows.name:
That's right. That's gotta be why
this place is getting to you, too.

rows.label: bf07270100_0170
rows.name:
This much ain't a big deal.
C'mon, let's hurry on!
